paper_abstract: The main result is that to any even integer q in the interval 0 <= q <= 2(n+1-2) (log(n+1)), there are two perfect codes C-1 and C-2 of length n = 2(m) -1, m >= 4, such that vertical bar C-1 boolean AND C-2 vertical bar = q.
paper_title: On intersection problem for perfect binary codes
